experiences.title: Software Developer
desc: Developed user interfaces for both mobile and web applications focused on managing fishing trips in Finland.
Performed bug fixes, code refactoring, test writing, and documentation improvements.
Engaged in full-stack development for a desktop application tailored to forwarders, enabling streamlined management of wood harvesting operations in forest environments.
Contributed to UX/UI design enhancements to ensure optimal user experience across applications.
Adhered to the Scrum methodology for agile project management.
Conducted thorough code reviews to maintain code quality and consistency.
Onboarded and mentered interns during their training programs
Technologies: Typescript, React, React Native, Electron, Material UI, Open layers, Zustand, Redis, Redux, Redux-toolkit, Springboot, Docker,...

experiences.title: Jr. Software Developer
desc: Developed a user-friendly interface for billing and invoicing services dashboard.
Resolved issues and bugs in dashboard functionalities.
Maintained, developed, and implemented other products such as job portal
Contributed to UX/UI design enhancements to ensure optimal user experience across applications.
Technologies: Javascript, React, Material UI, Redux, Redux-saga, Microsoft Azure

experiences.title: Jr. Frontend Developer
desc: Designed and developed UI components using React.js for calendar, streaming platforms, and meeting applications tailored to Japanese clients' business needs.
Addressed bugs and implemented new functionalities.
Technologies: Javascript, React, Node.js, Firebase, TailwindCss

projects.title: Bike App
projects.desc: A full-stack pre-assignments of Solita Dev Academy 2022, imported some csv files and stored in Mongodb, front-end was built with React, some animation with Gsap, used Ant Design to spice the UI up. Back-end was built with Node.js and Express.js. This application can be used to look up and find bike station in Finland, user can also find and add more journeys to the tables.
